forecast-period.text: Partly cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers, most likely in the late morning and afternoon. The chance of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Light winds becoming easterly 15 to 25 km/h in the middle of the day then tending southeasterly 20 to 30 km/h in the early afternoon.
Low-Moderate
UV Alert from 8:30 am to 3:20 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 10 [Very High]
Cloudy. Medium (50%) chance of showers. Light winds becoming southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h in the morning.
Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower. Winds southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h.

Partly cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers, most likely in the morning and afternoon. The chance of a thunderstorm in the afternoon and evening. Light winds becoming east to southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the morning then becoming light during the evening.
Mostly sunny. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Light winds becoming easterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day.
Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Light winds becoming east to northeasterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day.
Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Light winds becoming northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the day.

Partly cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers, most likely in the late morning. The chance of a thunderstorm from late this morning. Light winds becoming south to southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h in the morning then becoming southeasterly 25 to 35 km/h in the middle of the day.
Low-Moderate
UV Alert from 8:20 am to 3:20 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 10 [Very High]

Partly cloudy. Medium (50%) chance of showers, most likely in the morning. Winds southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h.

Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Light winds becoming easterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day.
Partly cloudy. Light winds becoming northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the day.

Partly cloudy. High (70%) chance of showers from late this morning. The chance of a thunderstorm this afternoon, possibly severe. Light winds becoming southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h in the late afternoon.
Low-Moderate
UV Alert from 8:20 am to 3:20 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 11 [Extreme]
Cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers, most likely in the morning and afternoon. The chance of a thunderstorm about the hinterland in the afternoon. Winds southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h.
Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower. Winds southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h.

Partly cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers, most likely in the morning and afternoon. The chance of a thunderstorm in the afternoon and evening. Winds southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h becoming light during the evening.
